headline: Date and Dried Cherry Mostarda
name: Date and Dried Cherry Mostarda
description: This sweet and tangy mostarda blends the rich flavors of Medjool dates and tart cherries with a hint of orange and spice. Enjoy it warm or at room temperature for a delightful burst of flavor.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine dates, cherries, shallot, wine, vinegar, orange zest, orange juice, sugar, crystallized ginger, salt, cinnamon, and crushed red pepper in a small saucepan. Bring to a boil; reduce heat to low and simmer, covered, until liquid is absorbed and fruit is softened, about 10 minutes.
Stir in butter, mustard, and mustard powder. Simmer, uncovered, until mixture is thickened and jam-like, 2 to 3 minutes. Serve warm or at room temperature.
